subject: There is a better way!
msgSnippet: I will be more carefull, discussion is easy to extinguish. The link in the last post was educational though the reformed spellings in the last part scare me.
messageBody:
I will be more carefull, discussion is easy to extinguish.
The link in the last post was educational though the "reformed"
spellings in the last part scare me. TH for both THe and THink is
obaying the conditions that put English spellings into the state they
are in the first place, not to mention the vowels.
For now I opt for using the Icelandic alphabet, It's the one we would
be using if history had taken a few different turns.

Though, As always, Quickscript is better.
